glsa.title: libvirt: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in libvirt, worst of which allows context-dependent attackers to cause Denial of Service.

background.p: libvirt is a C toolkit for manipulating virtual machines.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libvirt. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A context-dependent attacker may be able to cause Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libvirt users should upgrade to the latest version:
